name: Cannon Ball (Dripping Tap)
description:
Cannon Ball is a simple 2d platformer with only one level. It's a test project and we just want to see what you guys think of it. There is no score, no collectables... All you need to do is get to the end.

Controls:

  • A - move left
  • D - move right
  • Space - jump
  • R - quick restart from last checkpoint (level stats are untouched)
  • P - show pause menu with audio options and hard level restart (start from the beginning and wipe stats)
  • Esc - exit full screen mode

At the same time as you move the cannon ball, you might be able to control other items in the scene, like cannons or pinball paddles. There are no separate key bindings for those. You just control them at the same time as the ball with the same buttons.

Credits:

Majority of coding, graphics and audio effects by Rychu and Grayando.
